biography:
Courtney Solomon is a Canadian film producer.

Solomon produced and directed the 2000 film Dungeons & Dragons. His latest film, An American Haunting, is based on the Bell Witch legend in Tennessee.

He is the founder and present head of After Dark Films, a film production and distribution company specializing in horror films, and organizer of the annual horror film festival Horrorfest featuring 8 Films to Die For.
name: Courtney Solomon
